Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.GUI

Class TurnSceneController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.GUI.TurnSceneController
public class TurnSceneController extends Object
A scene controller used for communicating with the gameScene

    Method
    Description
    void
    acceptCardDrop​(javafx.scene.input.DragEvent dragEvent)
    If the drag and drop sequence starts from the TempDevCard, accept the drop
    void
    acceptDrop​(javafx.scene.input.DragEvent dragEvent)
    Checks if source of the dragEvent is compatible with the gestureSource and in case accept the transferMode "MOVE"
    void
    activateLeader​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
    Create a message (LeaderActivationMessage with the id of the leader to activate.
    void
    addFaith()
    Creates a new AddFaithMessage and sends it to the server.
    void
    buyDevActionPhaseDisables()
    Sets a disable pattern for the development card payments phase.
    void
    closeProductionPane()
    Sets the text of each label as "x0" and than sets productionPane as invisible and disabled.
    void
    columnCall​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent mouseEvent)
    Creates a message (MarketDrawMessage) to draw the chosen column.
    void
    convertUCosts​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent mouseEvent)
    Increase the count on the label of the clicked resource (EventObject.getSource()) and adds the resource to the list of conversions for unknown costs.
    void
    convertUEarnings​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent mouseEvent)
    Increase the count on the label of the clicked resource (EventObject.getSource()) and adds the resource to the list of conversions for unknown earnings.
    void
    disableAll​(boolean value)
    Disables or enables common things and the player's pane.
    void
    discardLeader​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
    Removes the image of the selected leader and create a message (LeaderDiscardingMessage with the id of the leader to discard.
    void
    dragCard​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent mouseEvent)
    Starts the drag and drop sequence from the tempDevCard
    void
    dragDone​(javafx.scene.input.DragEvent dragEvent)
    End the drag sequence for a sequence started from an ImageView -> remove the image
    void
    dragResource​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent mouseEvent)
    Starts a Drag and drop sequence for a resource (it is shared by Warehouse, Strongbox and MarketBuffer)
    void
    dragStrongBoxResourceDone​(javafx.scene.input.DragEvent dragEvent)
    End the drag sequence for a sequence started from the strongbox
    void
    drawDevCard​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent mouseEvent)
    Enlarges the clicked card and sets a temporary message DevCardDrawMessage for the selected card If you had previously clicked on another card changes the message and the visualization of the previous and the new clicked card
    void
    dropCard​(javafx.scene.input.DragEvent dragEvent)
    If you can drop the card here(EventObject.getSource()) sets a temporary message DevCardPlacementMessage with the relative column.
    void
    dropResourcePayments​(javafx.scene.input.DragEvent dragEvent)
    If you can drop the resource here(EventObject.getSource()) increments the count on the relative label.
    void
    dropResourceWarehouse​(javafx.scene.input.DragEvent dragEvent)
    If you can drop the resource here(EventObject.getSource()) sets a temporary message WarehouseInsertionMessage with the relative list of chosen resources, and set the image of the chosen resource in the selected imageView.
    void
    endTurnPhaseDisables()
    Sets a disable pattern for the end of turn phase.
    void
    endTurnState()
    Sets the text on the button Confirm to EndTurn
    void
    keepEnabledOnly​(List<String> ids)
    Keeps enabled only the requested elements inside the player pane and disables everything else inside the pane.
    void
    loadStartingMatch()
    Prepare the scene before the starts of the game: sets the id of the players' boards and makes invisible the remaining boards.
    void
    marketActionPhaseDisables()
    Sets a disable pattern for the white marble conversions phase.
    void
    placeDevCardPhaseDisables()
    Sets a disable pattern for the development card placement phase.
    static void
    populateDevCardSlots​(List<String>[] devCardSlots, javafx.scene.layout.HBox devCardHBox)
    Sets the correct images for the devCardSlots, if a card is present sets its image, otherwise sets null that image

    Sets the correct images for hand leaders either they are explicit or -1

    Places the right images on the right slot of the marketBufferBox
    static void

    Synchronizes the graphic content of the player pane with the data stored in the LightPlayer
    static void
    populatePopeTiles​(List<Integer> popeTiles, javafx.scene.layout.Pane interestedPane)
    Places the right images for the pope tiles inside the interestedPane, this could be myPane or an enemy pane
    static void
    populateStrongbox​(List<PhysicalResource> newStrongbox, javafx.scene.layout.VBox strongboxVbox)
    Writes the right number of resource for every type inside the labels of the strongboxVbox
    static void
    populateWarehouse​(List<PhysicalResource> warehouse, javafx.scene.layout.Pane warehousePane)
    Places the right images on the right slot of the warehousePane
    void
    printLastRound()
    Puts visible the flag about the last round of the match.
    void
    printRetry​(String errMessage)
    Displays a pop-up showing the relative message
    void
    produce​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent mouseEvent)
    Adds the chosen card (EventObject.getSource()) to the list of cards to produce if it is not already contained, adds a glow effect on the card, and increases numEarnings if the card chosen is a leader card.
    void
    produceBasicProd()
    Adds "BASICPROD" to the list of cards to produce if it is not already contained, adds a glow effect on the card, and increases numUCosts and numUEarnings.
    void
    productionActionPhaseDisables()
    Sets a disable pattern for the production phase.
    void
    refreshAll()
    Restore all the graphic contents to the values saved in the lightMatch, erase the current temporary message and initialize the temporary variables.
    void
    resetPayments()
    Resets the situation if the payments has gone wrong or are finished -> recharges the warehouse and strongbox watching the one saved on the lightPlayer and restore the payments pane to his starting situation
    void
    resetPlacement()
    Resets the situation if the placement of a card has gone wrong -> recharges the devCardSlots watching the one saved on the lightPlayer and eventually restore the tempDevCard
    void
    resourcesPlacementPhaseDisables()
    Sets a disable pattern for the resources placement phase.
    void
    rowCall​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent mouseEvent)
    Creates a message (MarketDrawMessage) to draw the chosen row.
    void
    sendMessage()
    Function called by the press of confirm button, sends the temporary message saved or EndTurnMessage if it is the case
    static void
    setActiveLeadersImages​(List<String> newActiveLeaders, javafx.scene.layout.HBox activeLeaders)
    Sets the correct images for active leaders if they are present, empties the imageView otherwise

    Updates the graphic visualization of the strongbox for the relative player to the new passed value
    void
    updateTempDevCard​(String card)
    Updates the graphic visualization of the TempDevCard to the new passed value or remove the image if the id is not correct or it is null or ""
    void
    updateTokenDrawn​(String tokenName, int remainingTokens)
    Updates the graphic visualization of the last token drawn and the remaining tokens to the new passed values
    void
    updateWarehouse​(String nickname, List<PhysicalResource> warehouse)
    Updates the graphic visualization of the warehouse for the relative player to the new passed value

  • Constructor Details

    • TurnSceneController

      public TurnSceneController()
      Creates an instance and links it to the SceneProxy. Initialize all the temporary variables

  • Method Details

    • refreshAll

      public void refreshAll()
      Restore all the graphic contents to the values saved in the lightMatch, erase the current temporary message and initialize the temporary variables. It doesn't affect current state

    • populatePlayerPane

      public static void populatePlayerPane​(LightPlayer player, javafx.scene.layout.Pane playerPane)
      Synchronizes the graphic content of the player pane with the data stored in the LightPlayer
      Parameters:
      player - the playerPane's owner
      playerPane - the Pane that represents the player board of the player passed

    • populateHandLeadersImages

      public static void populateHandLeadersImages​(List<String> newHandLeaders, javafx.scene.layout.HBox handLeaders)
      Sets the correct images for hand leaders either they are explicit or -1
      Parameters:
      newHandLeaders - the list of ids or -1
      handLeaders - the graphic object that shows the leaders

    • setActiveLeadersImages

      public static void setActiveLeadersImages​(List<String> newActiveLeaders, javafx.scene.layout.HBox activeLeaders)
      Sets the correct images for active leaders if they are present, empties the imageView otherwise
      Parameters:
      newActiveLeaders - the list of ids that represents the active leaders
      activeLeaders - the graphic object that shows the leaders

    • populateMarketBuffer

      public static void populateMarketBuffer​(List<PhysicalResource> marketBuffer, javafx.scene.layout.Pane marketBufferBox)
      Places the right images on the right slot of the marketBufferBox
      Parameters:
      marketBuffer - the values of the effective marketBuffer
      marketBufferBox - the graphic object that represents the market buffer

    • populateDevCardSlots

      public static void populateDevCardSlots​(List<String>[] devCardSlots, javafx.scene.layout.HBox devCardHBox)
      Sets the correct images for the devCardSlots, if a card is present sets its image, otherwise sets null that image
      Parameters:
      devCardSlots - the array of columns that occupies the devCardSlots, the values inside the lists are the ids of the cards
      devCardHBox - the graphic object that shows the devCardSlots

    • populateWarehouse

      public static void populateWarehouse​(List<PhysicalResource> warehouse, javafx.scene.layout.Pane warehousePane)
      Places the right images on the right slot of the warehousePane
      Parameters:
      warehouse - the values of the effective warehouse
      warehousePane - the graphic object that represents the warehouse

    • populateStrongbox

      public static void populateStrongbox​(List<PhysicalResource> newStrongbox, javafx.scene.layout.VBox strongboxVbox)
      Writes the right number of resource for every type inside the labels of the strongboxVbox
      Parameters:
      newStrongbox - the values of the effective strongbox
      strongboxVbox - the graphic object that represents the strongbox

    • populatePopeTiles

      public static void populatePopeTiles​(List<Integer> popeTiles, javafx.scene.layout.Pane interestedPane)
      Places the right images for the pope tiles inside the interestedPane, this could be myPane or an enemy pane
      Parameters:
      popeTiles - the values of the effective popeTiles (0 -> the tile is absent 1 -> the tile is upside 2 -> the tile is downside)
      interestedPane - the graphic object that contains a playerBoard

    • setPopeTileImage

      public static void setPopeTileImage​(int order, int value, javafx.scene.image.ImageView popeTileView)
      Places the right image for the popeTileView passed
      Parameters:
      order - the order of the pope tile, from the start of the faith path (the first has order 1)
      value - the value of the effective popeTile (0 -> the tile is absent 1 -> the tile is upside 2 -> the tile is downside)
      popeTileView - the graphic object that contains a popeTile image

    • endTurnState

      public void endTurnState()
      Sets the text on the button Confirm to EndTurn

    • resetPayments

      public void resetPayments()
      Resets the situation if the payments has gone wrong or are finished -> recharges the warehouse and strongbox watching the one saved on the lightPlayer and restore the payments pane to his starting situation

    • resetPlacement

      public void resetPlacement()
      Resets the situation if the placement of a card has gone wrong -> recharges the devCardSlots watching the one saved on the lightPlayer and eventually restore the tempDevCard

    • loadStartingMatch

      public void loadStartingMatch()
      Prepare the scene before the starts of the game: sets the id of the players' boards and makes invisible the remaining boards. Than calls the updates to loads all the elements in the scene, including the personalBoard of every player. This methods is also call in case of reconnection.

    • disableAll

      public void disableAll​(boolean value)
      Disables or enables common things and the player's pane.
      Parameters:
      value - disable boolean value

    • keepEnabledOnly

      public void keepEnabledOnly​(List<String> ids)
      Keeps enabled only the requested elements inside the player pane and disables everything else inside the pane. Confirm button always remain activated
      Parameters:
      ids - list of chosen elements' ids

    • marketActionPhaseDisables

      public void marketActionPhaseDisables()
      Sets a disable pattern for the white marble conversions phase. In this phase, only warehouse (for switches) and active leaders must be enabled.

    • resourcesPlacementPhaseDisables

      public void resourcesPlacementPhaseDisables()
      Sets a disable pattern for the resources placement phase. In this phase, only warehouse and market buffer must be enabled (for switches and insertions).

    • buyDevActionPhaseDisables

      public void buyDevActionPhaseDisables()
      Sets a disable pattern for the development card payments phase. In this phase, only the payments pane, warehouse and strongbox must be enabled (to drag and drop resources from a resources storage to the pane).

    • placeDevCardPhaseDisables

      public void placeDevCardPhaseDisables()
      Sets a disable pattern for the development card placement phase. In this phase, only the warehouse (for switches), the temporary dev card slot and the dev card slots must be enabled (to drag and drop the card into a slot).

    • productionActionPhaseDisables

      public void productionActionPhaseDisables()
      Sets a disable pattern for the production phase. In this phase, only the payments pane, the resources storage and the dev card slots must be enabled (in order to select cards to produce and have the chance to pay them).

    • endTurnPhaseDisables

      public void endTurnPhaseDisables()
      Sets a disable pattern for the end of turn phase. In this phase, only the warehouse (for switches) and the leaders menuBars (for activations/discards) must be enabled.

    • useLeader

      public void useLeader​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent mouseEvent)
      Activate the power of the clicked leader only if it's a leader that convert the white marbles or if it is a leader that can start a production. In the first case adds the conversion to the list of conversion and if the list is full decrease the count of the conversions of the other type, after that create a message (WhiteMarblesConversionMessage). In the second case calls the relative function.
      Parameters:
      mouseEvent - the mouseEvent that calls the method.

    • yourTurn

      public void yourTurn​(boolean yourTurn)
      Sets the right text on informationField and confirmButton. Disables all the panes you can't use in this phase.
      Parameters:
      yourTurn - true if it's your turn, false if it's not.

    • switchShelf

      public void switchShelf​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent mouseEvent)
      When called two times, sends a SwitchShelfMessage asking for a switch between the two sources that has called this method
      Parameters:
      mouseEvent - the event that triggered this method

    • activateLeader

      public void activateLeader​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Create a message (LeaderActivationMessage with the id of the leader to activate.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - the actionEvent who calls the method

    • discardLeader

      public void discardLeader​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Removes the image of the selected leader and create a message (LeaderDiscardingMessage with the id of the leader to discard.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - the actionEvent who calls the method

    • columnCall

      public void columnCall​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent mouseEvent)
      Creates a message (MarketDrawMessage) to draw the chosen column.
      Parameters:
      mouseEvent - the mouseEvent who calls the method

    • rowCall

      public void rowCall​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent mouseEvent)
      Creates a message (MarketDrawMessage) to draw the chosen row.
      Parameters:
      mouseEvent - the mouseEvent who calls the method

    • drawDevCard

      public void drawDevCard​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent mouseEvent)
      Enlarges the clicked card and sets a temporary message DevCardDrawMessage for the selected card If you had previously clicked on another card changes the message and the visualization of the previous and the new clicked card
      Parameters:
      mouseEvent - the event that triggered this method

    • dragCard

      public void dragCard​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent mouseEvent)
      Starts the drag and drop sequence from the tempDevCard
      Parameters:
      mouseEvent - the event that triggered this method

    • dropCard

      public void dropCard​(javafx.scene.input.DragEvent dragEvent)
      If you can drop the card here(EventObject.getSource()) sets a temporary message DevCardPlacementMessage with the relative column. It doesn't control if you can place effectively the card but only if there is still space in the stack
      Parameters:
      dragEvent - the event that triggered this method

    • acceptCardDrop

      public void acceptCardDrop​(javafx.scene.input.DragEvent dragEvent)
      If the drag and drop sequence starts from the TempDevCard, accept the drop
      Parameters:
      dragEvent - the event that triggered this method

    • zoomInCard

      public void zoomInCard​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent mouseEvent)
      Enlarges the dimensions of the ImageView source
      Parameters:
      mouseEvent - the event that triggered this method

    • zoomOutCard

      public void zoomOutCard​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent mouseEvent)
      Reduce the dimensions of the ImageView source
      Parameters:
      mouseEvent - the event that triggered this method

    • produce

      public void produce​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent mouseEvent)
      Adds the chosen card (EventObject.getSource()) to the list of cards to produce if it is not already contained, adds a glow effect on the card, and increases numEarnings if the card chosen is a leader card. Otherwise if the card is already on the list, the method removes it, removes the glow effect and removes the chosen conversions if they exist. Finally the method creates a message (ProductionMessage)
      Parameters:
      mouseEvent - that calls the function

    • produceBasicProd

      public void produceBasicProd()
      Adds "BASICPROD" to the list of cards to produce if it is not already contained, adds a glow effect on the card, and increases numUCosts and numUEarnings. Otherwise if the card is already on the list, the method removes it, removes the glow effect and removes the chosen conversions if they exist. Finally the method creates a message (ProductionMessage)

    • convertUCosts

      public void convertUCosts​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent mouseEvent)
      Increase the count on the label of the clicked resource (EventObject.getSource()) and adds the resource to the list of conversions for unknown costs. It also put on the imageView of the unknown cost of the card the image of the chosen resource. If already exists a conversion for the selected unknown cost it replace it.
      Parameters:
      mouseEvent - the mouseEvent that calls the method.

    • convertUEarnings

      public void convertUEarnings​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent mouseEvent)
      Increase the count on the label of the clicked resource (EventObject.getSource()) and adds the resource to the list of conversions for unknown earnings. It also put on the imageView of the unknown earning of the card the image of the chosen resource. If already exists a conversion for the selected unknown earning it replace it.
      Parameters:
      mouseEvent - the mouseEvent that calls the method.

    • closeProductionPane

      public void closeProductionPane()
      Sets the text of each label as "x0" and than sets productionPane as invisible and disabled.

    • dragResource

      public void dragResource​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent mouseEvent)
      Starts a Drag and drop sequence for a resource (it is shared by Warehouse, Strongbox and MarketBuffer)
      Parameters:
      mouseEvent - the mouseEvent that starts the sequence

    • dropResourceWarehouse

      public void dropResourceWarehouse​(javafx.scene.input.DragEvent dragEvent)
      If you can drop the resource here(EventObject.getSource()) sets a temporary message WarehouseInsertionMessage with the relative list of chosen resources, and set the image of the chosen resource in the selected imageView. It doesn't control if you can place effectively the resource but only if there is still space in the HBox
      Parameters:
      dragEvent - the event that triggered this method

    • acceptDrop

      public void acceptDrop​(javafx.scene.input.DragEvent dragEvent)
      Checks if source of the dragEvent is compatible with the gestureSource and in case accept the transferMode "MOVE"
      Parameters:
      dragEvent - the relative dragEvent

    • dragDone

      public void dragDone​(javafx.scene.input.DragEvent dragEvent)
      End the drag sequence for a sequence started from an ImageView -> remove the image
      Parameters:
      dragEvent - the relative dragEvent

    • dragStrongBoxResourceDone

      public void dragStrongBoxResourceDone​(javafx.scene.input.DragEvent dragEvent)
      End the drag sequence for a sequence started from the strongbox
      Parameters:
      dragEvent - the relative dragEvent

    • dropResourcePayments

      public void dropResourcePayments​(javafx.scene.input.DragEvent dragEvent)
      If you can drop the resource here(EventObject.getSource()) increments the count on the relative label. Than it modify the list of payments from strongbox or from warehouse depends on the granParent of DragEvent.getGestureSource() and sets a temporary message PaymentsMessage with the relative lists of resources to pay from warehouse or strongbox.
      Parameters:
      dragEvent - the event that triggered this method

    • updateHandLeaders

      public void updateHandLeaders​(String nickname, List<String> newHandLeaders)
      Updates the graphic visualization of the hand leaders for the relative player to the new passed value
      Parameters:
      nickname - the player whom the update is faced to
      newHandLeaders - the new value

    • updateActiveLeaders

      public void updateActiveLeaders​(String nickname, List<String> newActiveLeaders)
      Updates the graphic visualization of the active leaders for the relative player to the new passed value
      Parameters:
      nickname - the player whom the update is faced to
      newActiveLeaders - the new value

    • updateMarket

      public void updateMarket​(char[][] market)
      Updates the graphic visualization of the market to the new passed value
      Parameters:
      market - the new value

    • updateMarketBuffer

      public void updateMarketBuffer​(String nickname, List<PhysicalResource> marketBuffer)
      Updates the graphic visualization of the market buffer for the relative player to the new passed value
      Parameters:
      nickname - the player whom the update is faced to
      marketBuffer - the new value

    • updateWarehouse

      public void updateWarehouse​(String nickname, List<PhysicalResource> warehouse)
      Updates the graphic visualization of the warehouse for the relative player to the new passed value
      Parameters:
      nickname - the player whom the update is faced to
      warehouse - the new value

    • updateFaithMarker

      public void updateFaithMarker​(String nickname, int faithMarker)
      Updates the graphic visualization of the faith marker for the relative player to the new passed value
      Parameters:
      nickname - the player whom the update is faced to
      faithMarker - the new value

    • updatePopeTiles

      public void updatePopeTiles​(String nickname, List<Integer> popeTiles)
      Updates the graphic visualization of the popeTiles for the relative player to the new passed value
      Parameters:
      nickname - the player whom the update is faced to
      popeTiles - the new value

    • updateStrongBox

      public void updateStrongBox​(String nickname, List<PhysicalResource> newStrongbox)
      Updates the graphic visualization of the strongbox for the relative player to the new passed value
      Parameters:
      nickname - the player whom the update is faced to
      newStrongbox - the new value

    • updateDisconnections

      public void updateDisconnections​(String nickname, boolean connected)
      Updates the graphic visualization of the connection state for the relative player to the new passed value
      Parameters:
      nickname - the player whom the update is faced to
      connected - true if the player is connected, false if it is disconnected

    • updateTokenDrawn

      public void updateTokenDrawn​(String tokenName, int remainingTokens)
      Updates the graphic visualization of the last token drawn and the remaining tokens to the new passed values
      Parameters:
      tokenName - the name of the extracted token
      remainingTokens - the number of tokens remained in the pile

    • updateCardGrid

      public void updateCardGrid​(List<String>[][] cards)
      Updates the graphic visualization of the CardGrid to the new passed value
      Parameters:
      cards - the new value

    • updateTempDevCard

      public void updateTempDevCard​(String card)
      Updates the graphic visualization of the TempDevCard to the new passed value or remove the image if the id is not correct or it is null or ""
      Parameters:
      card - the id of the new tempDevCard or null if there isn't a tempDevCard

    • updateDevCardSlots

      public void updateDevCardSlots​(String nickname, List<String>[] devCardSlots)
      Updates the graphic visualization of the DevCardSlots for the relative player to the new passed value
      Parameters:
      nickname - the player whom the update is faced to
      devCardSlots - the new value

    • printRetry

      public void printRetry​(String errMessage)
      Displays a pop-up showing the relative message
      Parameters:
      errMessage - the message you want to show

    • addFaith

      public void addFaith()
      Creates a new AddFaithMessage and sends it to the server.

    • setLastRound

      public void setLastRound​(boolean value)
      Setter
      Parameters:
      value - the new last round value

    • printLastRound

      public void printLastRound()
      Puts visible the flag about the last round of the match.

    • zoom

      public void zoom​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent mouseEvent)
      Displays a pop-up showing the playerBoard of the clicked player
      Parameters:
      mouseEvent - the event that has started this method

    • sendMessage

      public void sendMessage()
      Function called by the press of confirm button, sends the temporary message saved or EndTurnMessage if it is the case
